translation.Bem-vindo(a) √† Plataforma de Administra: Welcome to the PEDEA Administrator Platform!
translation.√â um prazer t√™-lo(a) conosco. Aqui voc: It is a pleasure to have you with us. Here, you will have access to a range of tools to manage and optimize our platform's functionalities. To make your navigation easier, we have prepared a complete tutorial that will guide you through the main available modules. It is worth noting that some features are restricted to administrator users only, so please follow the instructions carefully. Let's get started!
translation.Na p√°gina inicial, voc√™ encontrar√° um: On the homepage, you will find an overview of the available features on the platform. This is the starting point to access all the modules you will manage. Through it, you can easily navigate to each section using the main menu.
translation.Aproveite ao m√°ximo a plataforma! Segui: Make the most of the platform! By following this tutorial, you will be ready to explore all the features that PEDEA has to offer. If you need help, do not hesitate to contact our support team.
translation.Neste m√≥dulo, voc√™ ter√° o controle da: In this module, you will have control over the translation keys, essential for the internationalization of our platform. The keys are available in three languages: Portuguese, English, and Spanish. Here, you can:
translation.Criar novas chaves: Defina o nome da cha: Create new keys: Define the name of the key and add the corresponding translations in the three languages.
translation.Editar ou excluir chaves existentes: Ger: Edit or delete existing keys: Manage the keys as necessary, updating translations or removing keys that are no longer relevant.
translation.Importar chaves via CSV: Se preferir, vo: Import keys via CSV: If you prefer, you can import a CSV file containing the keys and their respective translations. This method speeds up the creation of several keys at once.
translation.Pesquisar chaves por camada e idioma: Fa: Search keys by layer and language: Facilitate the location of specific keys using the search system, which allows filtering results by language or layer.
translation.O Explorador de Dados permite que voc√™: The Data Explorer allows you to manage categories and data within the platform. The main functions include:
translation.Cria√ß√£o de novas categorias: Estruture: Creating new categories: Structure the data by creating specific categories as needed.
translation.Edi√ß√£o e exclus√£o de dados: Atualize: Editing and deleting data: Update or remove existing data within the categories.
translation.Importa√ß√£o de dados via CSV: Como no m: Importing data via CSV: As in the previous module, you can add data from a CSV file, following a predefined template.
translation.Tabela din√¢mica: Navegue entre os dados: Dynamic table: Navigate between active data in the explorer and the files sent to the database, allowing for more efficient data analysis and manipulation.
translation.Este m√≥dulo √© dedicado √† gest√£o das: This module is dedicated to managing the platform's frequently asked questions. You will have the ability to:
translation.Adicionar, editar ou excluir perguntas e: Add, edit, or delete questions and answers: Keep information always up to date and relevant.
translation.Card de Informa√ß√µes Ativas: Visualize: Active Information Card: View and manipulate active data related to frequently asked questions.
translation.Card de Atualiza√ß√µes da Plataforma: Ge: Platform Updates Card: Manage the data of the evolutionary updates page, keeping users informed about news and improvements on PEDEA.
translation.Por fim, o m√≥dulo de configura√ß√µes pe: Finally, the settings module allows you to manage your own user information. Options include:
translation.Visualizar dados pessoais: Verifique e m: View personal data: Check and keep your data up to date.
translation.Troca de imagem e senha: Altere sua foto: Change image and password: Change your profile picture and password directly here, ensuring security and personalization.
